p: Along with IgA, IgM antibodies are also secreted actively across the mucosa and may contribute to protection by preventing viral entry into the cells and also interfering with virus replication in the cells. 5, 18 The potential protective role of IgM antibodies is supported by a study in mice which has shown that IgM antibodies can neutralize influenza viruses in the presence of complement just as well as IgG antibodies. 19
